item.title: Alberta Labour Market Indicators
item.description: This is a work in progress. Labour Force Survey Each month Statistics Canada releases their Labour Force Survey. This is the main source of information on the latest labour market trends throughout Canada. A selection of some of the latest data is available here. Selected statistics for Calgary and Edmonton are here Survey of Payroll, Employment and Hours A summary of the latest SEPH data is available here

item.title: Alberta's Fiscal Future
item.description: The Alberta’s Fiscal Future (AFF) project is a two-year research/public engagement initiative providing the public and policy makers with in-depth analyses of Alberta’s fiscal situation and policy options to address it. The main site for the project is at the School of Public Policy.
